template.name: xbingRecyXml
template.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <layout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto" xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools">
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:background="@color/white" android:orientation="vertical" >
<ezy.ui.widget.CenteredTitleBar android:id="@+id/toolbar" style="@style/Toolbar.BackWithLine" app:title="好友助力" />
<android.support.v7.widget.RecyclerView app:layoutManager="android.support.v7.widget.LinearLayoutManager" android:id="@+id/recycler" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" /> </LinearLayout> </layout>

template.name: xRefreshListActivity
xbingXml
template.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <layout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto" xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools">
<data>
<import type="android.view.View" />
<variable name="onClick" type="android.view.View.OnClickListener" />
</data>
<android.support.constraint.ConstraintLayout android:orientation="vertical" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:gravity="center_horizontal">
</android.support.constraint.ConstraintLayout> </layout>

template.name: xsupertv
template.value: <com.allen.library.SuperTextView android:layout_marginTop="0dp" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" app:sCenterTextColor="@color/textPrimary" app:sCenterTextSize="@dimen/text_size_big" app:sCenterTextString="--" app:sDividerLineType="none" app:sLeftTextColor="@color/textPrimary" app:sLeftTextSize="@dimen/text_size_big" app:sLeftTextString="--" app:sLeftViewMarginLeft="0dp" app:sRightTextColor="@color/textPrimary" app:sRightTextSize="@dimen/text_size_big" app:sRightTextString="--" app:sRightViewMarginRight="0dp" app:sUseRipple="false" />

template.name: x-refreshNestscrollBind
template.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <layout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto" xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools">
<data>
</data>
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:orientation="vertical">
<ezy.ui.widget.CenteredTitleBar android:id="@+id/toolbar" style="@style/Toolbar.BgWhite" app:title="排行榜" />
<com.scwang.smartrefresh.layout.SmartRefreshLayout android:id="@+id/refresh" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent">
<com.tianyuan.sjnc.common.widget.CustomRefreshHeader android:layout_width="match_parent" app:titleTextColor="@color/textSecondary" app:backgroundColor="@color/grey_f4" android:layout_height="wrap_content" />
<android.support.v7.widget.RecyclerView android:id="@+id/list" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="10dp" app:layoutManager="android.support.v7.widget.LinearLayoutManager" /> </com.scwang.smartrefresh.layout.SmartRefreshLayout> </LinearLayout>
</layout>

template.name: xtextview
template.value: <TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginLeft="0dp" android:layout_marginTop="0dp" android:layout_marginRight="0dp" android:text="" android:textColor="@color/textPrimary" android:textSize="14dp" />

template.name: xCountdownView
template.value: <cn.iwgang.countdownview.CountdownView android:id="@+id/txt_count_down" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" app:isShowHour="true" app:isShowMinute="true" app:isShowSecond="true" app:isTimeTextBold="true" app:suffixGravity="bottom" app:suffixHour=":" app:suffixMinute=":" app:suffixTextColor="@color/color_61c048" app:timeTextColor="@color/color_61c048" app:timeTextSize="14sp" tools:text="00:08:52" />

template.name: xHtmlTv
template.value: <com.ljwx.view.HtmlTextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" app:htvCenterBold="true" app:htvCenterColor="@color/textPrimary" app:htvCenterSize="22dp" app:htvCenterString="21.9238091" app:htvLeftColor="@color/textSecondary" app:htvLeftSize="14dp" app:htvLeftString="￥" app:htvRightColor="@color/textPrimary" app:htvRightSize="16dp" app:htvRightString="5831" />

template.name: xinitrecycler
template.value: val mType = BindingType.create(::class.java, R.layout.) val mAdapter = MultiTypeAdapter(mType, ItemTypes.EMPTY) mBinding.recycler.adapter = mAdapter mAdapter.items = mAdapter.notifyDataSetChanged()

template.name: xroundlayout
template.value:
<ezy.ui.widget.round.RoundLayout android:layout_marginTop="18dp" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginLeft="15dp" android:layout_marginRight="15dp" android:paddingLeft="17dp" android:paddingTop="16dp" android:paddingRight="16dp" android:paddingBottom="17dp" app:rndCornerRadius="10dp" app:rndShadowColor="@color/grey_dddbdb" app:rndShadowLen="10dp" app:rndBottomShadowLen="10dp" app:rndTopShadowLen="10dp" app:rndLeftShadowLen="10dp" app:rndRightShadowLen="10dp" app:rndSolidColor="@color/white">
</ezy.ui.widget.round.RoundLayout>

template.name: xedittext
template.value: <EditText android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="33dp" android:background="@drawable/shape_grey_f4_r3" android:gravity="center_vertical" android:hint="输入或粘贴订单编号" android:paddingLeft="10dp" android:textColor="@color/textPrimary" android:textColorHint="@color/grey_be" android:textSize="14dp" />

template.name: xstart
